scripts.build-win: npm install && npm exec electron-packager ./ OpenPassy --all --overwrite && echo Writing zip file... && tar acf OpenPassy-win32-x64.zip OpenPassy-win32-x64/* && echo Wrote OpenPassy zip file to 'OpenPassy-win32-x64.zip'
scripts.build-linux: npm install && npm exec electron-packager ./ OpenPassy --all --overwrite && echo Writing zip file... && zip OpenPassy-linux-x64.zip OpenPassy-linux-x64/* && echo Wrote OpenPassy zip file to 'OpenPassy-linux-x64.zip'
